catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 788
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: red lacquered two-piece table; stem with dense round base, tapering toward top; square table top with indented, rounded corners
inscription: top of table, in gold pigment: [Myojin]; underside of tabletop: [Society of Shinra Daishi, one of stem tables, six large and six small, total twelve]; stem: [Myojin]; top of stem: [Society of Shinra Daishi, one of stem tables, six large and six small, total twelve]; bottom of stem: [Fifth month twenty-fifth day of 1482; Socity of Shinra Daishi, one of twelve stem tables; petitioner Gon Risshi Ryoju go Nakatani Hojibo]
medium: Negoro ware; wood, red and black lacquer with gold leaf inscription
provenance: Shinra Zenshindō, at Onjōji, Shiga Prefecture
title: Stem table
